comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: A cracker of a shot NLI.  Great detail including the line of cars down below.  The mix of services represented is impressive as are the range of uniforms on display.  Interesting that the VIP's are making their way to the steps while HRH is inspecting the guard of honour?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Yes, it's interesting that the VIPs aren't waiting until he's finished inspecting...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment._content: Nice Photo. Very big event & so many people there - - -
